original: 益州蜀郡人，或作李意其。見於葛洪所編撰《神仙傳》中，為方士，能占卜吉凶。夷陵之戰前，曾預言劉備兵敗，病死白帝城。
text: A native of Shujun in Yizhou, or Li Yiqi. Seen in "The Legend of the Immortals" compiled by Ge Hong, he is an alchemist who can predict good and bad luck. Before the Battle of Yiling, it was predicted that Liu Bei would be defeated and that Baidi City would die of illness.
